column2: eƒo nu na mí to Via si wòtia be wòanye nuwo katã ƒe domenyila la dzi

column4: eye wòna agbe nuwo katã to eƒe ŋusẽnya la me. Esi wòklɔ nu vɔ̃wo ɖa vɔ la
